summary.span: 抽象類別，做為抽象 及 類別的基底類別。

summary.span: 取得或設定用來填滿內容區域背景的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the used to fill the background of the content area.

value.span: 用來填滿內容區域背景的筆刷，不使用背景筆刷則為 。

span.span: The brush used to fill the background of the content area, or to not use a background brush.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 顯示可用的預先定義筆刷色彩的樣本的資料表，請參閱。For a table of swatches that show the available predefined brush colors, see . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性，使用當做範例項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute, using as the example element. [!code-xaml[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_BackgroundXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textelement_backgroundxaml)] 下圖顯示上述範例中的呈現方式。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 前景的綠色，背景為淡黃色](~/add/media/textelement-foreback.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 前景的綠色，背景為淡黃色")![Screenshot: Foreground of green, background bisque](~/add/media/textelement-foreback.png "Screenshot: Foreground of green, background bisque") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Background](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textelement_background)] [!code-vb[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Background](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textelement_background)]

span.span: A that represents the end of the content in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性通常用來將內容附加至結尾。The property is often used to append content to the end of a . 傳回這個屬性一律會有其設。The returned by this property always has its set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Media.FontFamily FontFamily { get; set; }
.property instance class System.Windows.Media.FontFamily FontFamily
Public Property FontFamily As FontFamily
public: property System::Windows::Media::FontFamily ^ FontFamily { System::Windows::Media::FontFamily ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::FontFamily ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定項目內容慣用的最上層字型家族。

span.span: Gets or sets the preferred top-level font family for the content of the element.

value.span: 指定慣用字型系列的 物件，或是具有一個或多個後援字型系列的主要慣用字型系列。

span.span: A object that specifies the preferred font family, or a primary preferred font family with one or more fallback font families.

value.span: 預設值是 值所決定的字型。

span.span: The default is the font determined by the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當指定多個系列時，第二個和後續的字型系列會做為後援，可在其中主要字型家族是無法使用或不適用的情況下使用。When multiple families are specified, the second and subsequent font families serve as fallback families to be used in cases where the primary font family is unavailable or not applicable. 此屬性會指定只在喜好設定。This property specifies a preference only. 如果指定的字型家族沒有以無訊息模式會回復為所決定的字型值。If the specified font family is not available, the silently falls back to the font determined by the value. 這個相依性屬性也會有附加的屬性使用方式。This dependency property also has an attached property usage. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，使用\<*物件* ="*值*".../ >，其中*物件*為物件項目 （通常資料流程項目）內含，和*值*是其中一個字串格式值 XAML 值中所述。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is \<*object* ="*value*".../>, where *object* is an object element (typically a flow element) contained within a , and *value* is one of the string-format values as explained in XAML Values. 程式碼中，附加的屬性的使用方式會受到和方法。In code, the attached property usage is supported by the and methods. 附加的屬性的使用方式並不常見，因為大部分的項目可以包含在支援，類似的附加的`FontFamily`屬性，而該內容主機的轉譯。The attached property usage is not common, because most elements that can be contained in a support an analogous nonattached `FontFamily` property, which the content host uses for rendering. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public double FontSize { get; set; }
.property instance float64 FontSize
Public Property FontSize As Double
public: property double FontSize { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定項目內容的字型大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the font size for the content of the element.

value.span: 要使用的字型大小，以裝置無關的像素為單位，大於 0.001 且小於或等於 35791。

span.span: The desired font size to use in device independent pixels, greater than 0.001 and less than or equal to 35791.

value.span: 預設值取決於目前的系統設定，並相依於值。

span.span: The default depends on current system settings and depends on the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個相依性屬性也會有附加的屬性使用方式。This dependency property also has an attached property usage. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，使用\<*物件* ="*值*".../ >，其中*物件*為物件項目 （通常資料流程項目）內含，和*值*是其中一個字串格式值 XAML 值中所述。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is \<*object* ="*value*".../>, where *object* is an object element (typically a flow element) contained within a , and *value* is one of the string-format values as explained in XAML Values. 程式碼中，附加的屬性的使用方式會受到和方法。In code, the attached property usage is supported by the and methods. 附加的屬性的使用方式並不常見，因為大部分的項目可以包含在支援，類似的附加的`FontSize`屬性，而該內容主機的轉譯。The attached property usage is not common, because most elements that can be contained in a support an analogous nonattached `FontSize` property, which the content host uses for rendering. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

exception.span: 會設定為大於 35791 或小於或等於 0.001 的值。

span.span: is set to a value greater than 35791 or less than or equal to 0.001.

summary.span: 取得或設定項目內容的字型自動縮放特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the font-stretching characteristics for the content of the element.

value.span: 結構，指定要使用的所需字型自動縮放特性。

span.span: A structure that specifies the desired font-stretching characteristics to use.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個相依性屬性也會有附加的屬性使用方式。This dependency property also has an attached property usage. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，使用\<*物件* ="*值*".../ >，其中*物件*為物件項目 （通常資料流程項目）內含，和*值*是字串格式的其中一個屬性名稱的類別。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is \<*object* ="*value*".../>, where *object* is an object element (typically a flow element) contained within a , and *value* is one of the string-format property names of the class. 程式碼中，附加的屬性的使用方式會受到和方法。In code, the attached property usage is supported by the and methods. 附加的屬性的使用方式並不常見，因為大部分的項目可以包含在支援，類似的附加的`FontStretch`屬性，而該內容主機的轉譯。The attached property usage is not common, because most elements that can be contained in a support an analogous nonattached `FontStretch` property, which the content host uses for rendering. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性，使用當做範例項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute, using as the example element. [!code-xaml[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_FontPropsXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textelement_fontpropsxaml)] 下圖顯示上述範例中的呈現方式。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 設定文字屬性文字](~/add/media/textelement-fontprops.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 設定文字屬性的文字")![Screenshot: Text with text properties set](~/add/media/textelement-fontprops.png "Screenshot: Text with text properties set") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_FontProps](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textelement_fontprops)] [!code-vb[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_FontProps](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textelement_fontprops)]

summary.span: 取得或設定要套用至項目內容的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the to apply to the content of the element.

value.span: 用來套用至文字內容的筆刷。

span.span: The brush used to apply to the text contents.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 樣本的資料表將顯示可用的預先定義筆刷色彩，請參閱。For a table of swatches that shows the available predefined brush colors, see . 這個相依性屬性也會有附加的屬性使用方式。This dependency property also has an attached property usage. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，使用\<*物件* ="*值*".../ >，其中*物件*為物件項目 （通常資料流程項目）內含，和*值*是可解析成的字串實作值。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is \<*object* ="*value*".../>, where *object* is an object element (typically a flow element) contained within a , and *value* is a string that resolves to a implementation value. 程式碼中，附加的屬性的使用方式會受到和方法。In code, the attached property usage is supported by the and methods. 附加的屬性的使用方式並不常見，因為大部分的項目可以包含在支援，類似的附加的`Foreground`屬性，而該內容主機的轉譯。The attached property usage is not common, because most elements that can be contained in a support an analogous nonattached `Foreground` property, which the content host uses for rendering. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性，使用當做範例項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute, using as the example element. [!code-xaml[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_BackgroundXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textelement_backgroundxaml)] 下圖顯示上述範例中的呈現方式。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 前景的綠色，背景為淡黃色](~/add/media/textelement-foreback.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 前景的綠色，背景為淡黃色")![Screenshot: Foreground of green, background bisque](~/add/media/textelement-foreback.png "Screenshot: Foreground of green, background bisque") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Background](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textelement_background)] [!code-vb[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Background](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textelement_background)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection TextEffects { get; set; }
.property instance class System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection TextEffects
Public Property TextEffects As TextEffectCollection
public: property System::Windows::Media::TextEffectCollection ^ TextEffects { System::Windows::Media::TextEffectCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::TextEffectCollection ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要套用至項目內容的文字效果集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of text effects to apply to the content of the element.

value.span: 包含一個或多個 物件的 ，用來定義要在這個項目中套用至內容的效果。

span.span: A containing one or more objects that define effects to apply to the content in this element.

value.span: 預設值為 (不是空的集合)。

span.span: The default is (not an empty collection).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，這個屬性設定為`null`且沒有與其相關聯。By default, this property is set to `null` and has no associated with it. 加入之前任何文字效果，請建立新並將它指派給這個屬性。Before adding any text effects, create a new and assign it to this property. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立簡單的文字效果，並將它套用到文字透過屬性。The following example shows how to create a simple text effect and apply it to a text through the property. [!code-csharp[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_TextEffects](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textelement_texteffects)] [!code-vb[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_TextEffects](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textelement_texteffects)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Documents.Typography Typography { get; }
.property instance class System.Windows.Documents.Typography Typography
Public ReadOnly Property Typography As Typography
public: property System::Windows::Documents::Typography ^ Typography { System::Windows::Documents::Typography ^ get(); };

summary.span: 為項目內容指定目前有效的印刷樣式變化。

span.span: Gets the currently effective typography variations for the content of the element.

value.span: 指定目前有效印刷樣式變化的 物件。

span.span: A object that specifies the currently effective typography variations.

value.span: 如需預設的印刷樣式值，請參閱 。

span.span: For a list of default typography values, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性只會套用於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]字型。The property is applicable only to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fonts. 印刷樣式變化的效果沒有上不支援 variant 的字型。A typography variant has no effect on fonts that do not support the variant. 如需有關本主題的詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF 中的印刷樣式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf.md)。For more information on this topic, see [Typography in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性，使用當做範例項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute, using as the example element. [!code-xaml[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_TypogXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textelement_typogxaml)] 下圖顯示上述範例中的呈現方式。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 已變更印刷的文字](~/add/media/textelement-typog.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 已變更印刷的文字")![Screenshot: Text with altered typography](~/add/media/textelement-typog.png "Screenshot: Text with altered typography") 相反地，下圖顯示如何轉譯套用預設印刷樣式屬性的類似範例。In contrast, the following figure shows how a similar example with default typographic properties renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 已變更印刷的文字](~/add/media/textelement-typog-default.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 已變更印刷的文字")![Screenshot: Text with altered typography](~/add/media/textelement-typog-default.png "Screenshot: Text with altered typography") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Typog](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textelement_typog)] [!code-vb[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Typog](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textelement_typog)]
